name: Varden Technologies
overview:
Varden was founded in 1999 on the principal that financial software projects can be completed faster and more effectively by people who understand both the technical and business side of a project. The Varden team consists of individuals with proven technology skills and a strong knowledge base in financial services.

For investment client reporting, eReportal is a data aggregation, reporting, and publication platform. It is open-ended from a data, presentation, workflow and deliverable-type standpoint. eReportal is built by investment technologists who understand the business and data of client reporting. From portal publication, pitchbook, client review, to statement automation, learn why eReportal drives a diverse set of client servicing and marketing strategies.
